title: Yasuo emote
body: I dont have the skin emote for yasuo and i dont know what else i dont have :(

replies.body: In order to get hose VS Event emotes you needed to have crafted the Daybreak or Nightfall icons. Crafting those icons gave you the temporary event emote, and having those during the event would have made you eligible to get the permanent version recently.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Id7wJLJQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-12T03:37:37.461+0000)
>
> In order to get hose VS Event emotes you needed to have crafted the Daybreak or Nightfall icons. Crafting those icons gave you the temporary event emote, and having those during the event would have made you eligible to get the permanent version recently.

I have it
